original_text: When they went, they went upon their four sides: and they turned not when they went.
korean_text: 그들이 갈 때에는 사방으로 향한 대로 돌이키지 아니하고 가며

sentences.original_text: When they went, they went upon their four sides
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 갈 때, 그들은 네 방향으로 갔다

sentences.original_text: and they turned not when they went
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 갈 때 돌지 않았다
